name: A Distant Ember
description: Our submission to the Unreal game jam 2020. In a team of 5 we worked for 5 days with the breif "What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw". Our game is about a small twig in a snowy forest who needs to get back to the campfire. in order to do so they make use their flames to melt snow and create a path back to the warmth.
